question:
Which among the following is/are characteristics of Plantation Agriculture?
  1. Capital-centered
  2. Good managerial ability
  3. Improved machineries
Select the correct code from the options given below:
explanation: Plantation Agriculture - It is capital-centered and needs good managerial ability, technical knowledge, improved machineries, fertilizers, irrigation and transport facilities. It requires a long growing period. It is practiced in Kerala, Karnataka, Assam and Maharashtra
